short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sample Size Calculator for A/B Testing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sample Size is designed to help you quickly calculate and chart the required sample size for your A/B tests. By inputting key metrics like baseline conversion rate, minimum detectable effect, statistical power, and significance level, this tool provides you with an accurate estimate of the number of subjects needed per variation to achieve statistically significant results.

Developed by Amanda Treutler with the help of Evan Miller
